com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet

Class RequestAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet.RequestAccessor

  • public final class RequestAccessor
extends Object
    Accessor for retrieving the current HttpServletRequest.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> T executeWithFallbackRequest(Supplier<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> fallbackRequest, Callable<T> callable)
      Execute the given Callable, using the given request as fallback if there is no other request available.
      static void executeWithFallbackRequest(Supplier<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> fallbackRequest, Executable executable)
      Execute the given Executable, using the given request as fallback if there is no other request available.

      Execute the given Executable with a given request.

        Replaces the default RequestFacade instance.

      • getCurrentRequest

        @Nonnull
public static javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest getCurrentRequest()
                                                                        throws RequestAccessException
        Returns the current HttpServletRequest, delegating to tryGetCurrentRequest() and unwrapping the Try.
        Returns:
        The current HttpServletRequest.
        Throws:
        RequestAccessException - If there is an issue while accessing the HttpServletRequest.

      • tryGetCurrentRequest

        @Nonnull
public static io.vavr.control.Try<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> tryGetCurrentRequest()
        Returns a Try of the current HttpServletRequest, or, if the Try is a failure, the global fallback.
        Returns:
        A Try of the current HttpServletRequest.

      • executeWithRequest

        @Nullable
public static <T> T executeWithRequest(@Nonnull
                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                 @Nonnull
                                                 Callable<T> callable)
                                          throws ThreadContextExecutionException
        Execute the given Callable with a given request.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the callable.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to execute with.
        callable - The callable to execute.
        Returns:
        The value computed by the callable.
        Throws:
        ThreadContextExecutionException - If there is an issue while running the code with the request.

      • executeWithFallbackRequest

        @Nullable
public static <T> T executeWithFallbackRequest(@Nonnull
                                                         Supplier<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> fallbackRequest,
                                                         @Nonnull
                                                         Callable<T> callable)
                                                  throws ThreadContextExecutionException
        Execute the given Callable, using the given request as fallback if there is no other request available.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the callable.
        Parameters:
        fallbackRequest - The request to fall back to.
        callable - The callable to execute.
        Returns:
        The value computed by the callable.
        Throws:
        ThreadContextExecutionException - If there is an issue while running the code with the request.

      • executeWithFallbackRequest

                                              Supplier<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> fallbackRequest,
                                              @Nonnull
                                              Executable executable)
                                       throws ThreadContextExecutionException
        Execute the given Executable, using the given request as fallback if there is no other request available.
        Parameters:
        fallbackRequest - The request to fall back to.
        executable - The executable to execute.
        Throws:
        ThreadContextExecutionException - If there is an issue while running the code with the request.

      • getRequestFacade

        @Nonnull
public static RequestFacade getRequestFacade()
        The RequestFacade instance.

      • getFallbackRequest

        @Nullable
public static Supplier<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> getFallbackRequest()
        Global fallback HttpServletRequest. By default, no fallback is used, i.e., the fallback is null. A global fallback can be useful to ease testing with a mocked request.

      • setFallbackRequest

        public static void setFallbackRequest(@Nullable
                                      Supplier<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> fallbackRequest)
        Global fallback HttpServletRequest. By default, no fallback is used, i.e., the fallback is null. A global fallback can be useful to ease testing with a mocked request.
